personal_info.name: Sarthak Singh
personal_info.title: Senior Associate | Data Scientist
personal_info.bio: Data Scientist with 3 years of experience in designing and deploying data‑driven solutions using AWS and AI technologies. Proven track record in developing robust ETL pipelines, creating conversational AI agents, and optimizing cloud‑based systems. Skilled in Python, AWS, and machine learning, with a strong foundation in mathematics and computing.

projects.title: GenAI Career Assistant
projects.description: AI-powered career guidance system using natural language processing to provide personalized career recommendations and skill development paths.

projects.title: Data Classification
projects.description: Advanced data classification system using generative AI for automated content categorization and data organization.

projects.title: Threat Hunting Agent
projects.description: AI-powered cybersecurity agent for proactive threat detection and analysis using machine learning algorithms.

projects.title: FPL Toolset
projects.description: Fantasy Premier League analysis toolkit with AI-driven player recommendations and performance predictions.

projects.title: Vendor Compliance Agent
projects.description: Designed an agentic workflow using OpenSearch, LangChain, and Bedrock to evaluate third-party vendor evidence for compliance, generate comprehensive gap analyses, and develop a custom evaluator—reducing evaluation time by 99%

projects.title: Anomaly Detection
projects.description: Machine learning system for detecting unusual patterns and anomalies in large datasets using statistical and ML approaches.

projects.title: Customer Segmentation
projects.description: Advanced customer segmentation analysis using machine learning clustering algorithms for targeted marketing strategies.
